Flow.description: This Process is used to clear the values stored on the Resource Asset Record when 'Not Enough Information' is made true
Flow.label: SSP Not Enough Information Update for Resources

recordUpdates.name: myRule_1_A1
recordUpdates.label: Update Resource Asset Record values to empty

value.stringValue: Has Itemized Stmt of Goods Signed ?
Has Policy assigned for Funeral Home ?
Pre Funeral Goods and Services Cost

recordUpdates.name: myRule_1_A2
recordUpdates.label: Update Resource Asset Related Record values to empty

recordUpdates.name: myRule_3_A1
recordUpdates.label: Update Resource Asset Record values to empty

value.stringValue: Is Income Essential to Self Support ?

recordUpdates.name: myRule_5_A1
recordUpdates.label: Update Resource Asset Record values to empty

value.stringValue: Is Individual able to Ride this vehicle?
Why doesn't have Access to Vehicle ?

recordUpdates.name: myRule_7_A1
recordUpdates.label: Update Resource Asset Record values to empty

value.stringValue: Is Policy designate to Pay Burial
